content:
Assuming the project is evenly distributed across the three days, what is the estimated daily completion rate of the project in terms of percentage?
[Formula]: Daily completion rate = 100 / number of days needed to complete the project.

To calculate the estimated daily completion rate of the project in terms of percentage, you can use the given formula:

\[ \text{Daily completion rate} = \frac{100}{\text{number of days needed to complete the project}} \]

Given that the project is evenly distributed across three days, you can substitute the number of days into the formula:

\[ \text{Daily completion rate} = \frac{100}{3} \approx 33.33\% \]

Therefore, the estimated daily completion rate of the project is approximately 33.33% per day.
